name: ABGroup
desc: An object that represents a group of records in the Address Book database.

items.name: class func addPropertiesAndTypes([AnyHashable : Any]!) -> Int
items.desc: Adds the given properties to all records of this type in the Address Book database.

items.name: class func removeProperties([Any]!) -> Int
items.desc: Removes the given properties from all the records of this type in the Address Book database.

items.name: class func properties() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array of the names of all the properties for this record type in the Address Book database.

items.name: class func type(ofProperty: String!) -> ABPropertyType
items.desc: Returns the type for a given property.

items.name: func addMember(ABPerson!) -> Bool
items.desc: Adds a person to a group.

items.name: func removeMember(ABPerson!) -> Bool
items.desc: Removes a person from a group.

items.name: func members() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array of persons in a group.

items.name: func addSubgroup(ABGroup!) -> Bool
items.desc: Adds a subgroup to another group.

items.name: func removeSubgroup(ABGroup!) -> Bool
items.desc: Removes a subgroup from a group.

items.name: func parentGroups() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array containing a group’s parents—that is, the groups that a group belongs to.

items.name: func subgroups() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array containing a group’s subgroups.

items.name: func distributionIdentifier(forProperty: String!, person: ABPerson!) -> String!
items.desc: Returns the distribution identifier for the given property and person.

items.name: func setDistributionIdentifier(String!, forProperty: String!, person: ABPerson!) -> Bool
items.desc: Assigns a specific distribution identifier for a person’s multivalue list property so that the group can be used as a distribution list.

items.name: class func searchElement(forProperty: String!, label: String!, key: String!, value: Any!, comparison: ABSearchComparison) -> ABSearchElement!
items.desc: Returns a search element object that searches for records of this type.
